page.title: 04TRANSPORT-TAUNTON STATION
page.content: Taunton Station is on the main line from Paddington to Penzance with 64 passenger trains stopping in a 24 hr period.About 1000 passengers use the Station each day.The Station also handles about 200 tons of freight each day which includs 100 tons of cider.Four hundred bags of mail pass through the Station daily.The jouney time to Paddington by Intercity 125 is one and three quarter hours.The longest rail jouney which can be made from Taunton without changing trains is to Aberdeen. The Station and siding cover approximately 100 acres.There are improvements likely at the Station which include a new waiting room and fully automatic signalling with a new track lay-out to allow tains to pass through the station 100 m.p.h.
